key_findings: The previously-reported missing ensureItemTypePropertyExists_() function is already present in gas-scripts/drive-sheets-sync/Code.js (starts around line ~7120) and is called during sync (see call site around line ~7530).
The function uses data_sources when resolvable (API 2025-09-03 compatibility) and creates the Item-Type relation property targeting Item-Types via data_source_id.
next_actions: If runtime errors persist in production GAS, likely cause is that the deployed Apps Script project is behind the repo copy; run clasp push from gas-scripts/drive-sheets-sync after verifying the correct clasp project binding.

If the blocker is actually missing archive folders (Agent-Task 14e74b3b-4c4a-48bf-baf2-e050b7f3520b), that is a separate remediation path (Drive folder creation/backfill) and not addressed in this handoff closure.
